## kms-web3 package

Provides a web3 wallet backed [key management system](./kms-web3.web3keymanagementsystem.md) for the [KeyManager](./key-manager.keymanager.md)

## Classes

| Class                                                            | Description                                                                                                                                                                                                            |
| ---------------------------------------------------------------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| [Web3KeyManagementSystem](./kms-web3.web3keymanagementsystem.md) | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> This is a [KMS](./key-manager.abstractkeymanagementsystem.md) implementation that uses the addresses of a web3 wallet as key identifiers, and calls the respective wallet for signing operations. |
